context-param.param-value: GENIISYS (General Insurance Information System) is the leading integrated software solution in the general insurance industry having been successfully implemented in a total of 21 insurance companies in the Philippines since 1991. It is a powerful tool that can greatly improve workflow efficiency by integrating the different functions of a general insurance company.
